entry.title: Recap: Introduction to Minimal APIs
entry.content: Our July event covered Minimal APIs in .NET 8. Thanks to everyone who attended!

entry.title: Recap: Entity Framework Core Best Practices

link.title: Recap: Entity Framework Core Best Practices

entry.content: In June, we discussed best practices for using Entity Framework Core in modern .NET applications.
